attr.title: BBQ Quest
attr.desc: You are Kurt, a guy that was kicked from a BBQ Party. And now, his objective is to get COCA-COLA to the feast (the BBQ sauce is later)!!!
attr.inst:
Download the game from Game Jolt, https://gamejolt.com/games/bbq-quest/138672 tested with Windows version. Copy all assets to the gamedata folder.

Note: This game is not ideal for devices with low resolution displays and/or absent joysticks.
